nodes.text: The Ciaox Verith system was a star system where the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing stopped on its way to the Chadawa system in 5 ABY. While the 204th ran a combat drill in the midst of a jade-green plasma storm, the New Republic refitted Star Destroyer Deliverance arrived, having followed a communications signal burst from the 204th's bulk freighter Yadeez.

After the 204th was spotted by the Deliverance, part of the Deliverance's starfighter wing, the Wing Commander Wyl Lark and Flare Squadron, moved in and engaged the Imperial fighter wing while the refitted Star Destroyer rushed to reach firing range and deploy the rest of its starfighter wing. One 204th TIE and Lieutenant Lourgh T'oknell of Flare Squadron were killed before the 204th's fighters were recalled to the Yadeez and the Imperial fighter wing's starships escaped into hyperspace. The Deliverance and its wing pursued the Imperial unit across other regional star systems, tracking it from more comm bursts.
The Ciaox Verith system appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
